definition: an experienced person/sb who has "been around (the block)"/sb who has personally experienced it
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
(experienced action marker)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: You're both experienced persons and know well the depth of the water.
sentences.chinese: 你们都是过来人，知道水有多深。

sentences.english: He said that wouldnt be enough. I end up counselling people about it because Ive been through it.
sentences.chinese: 由于我是过来人，所以不愿对此事说长道短。

sentences.english: Industry executive, coach, friend, could be family member to be your mentor.
sentences.chinese: 行业主管，过来人，朋友，也可以找家人做你的导师。

sentences.english: I survived them so why shouldn't she listen to me and take in the knowledge that I had from the experiences of my past.
sentences.chinese: 我是过来人，为什么她就是听不进我的前车之鉴呢？

definition: to give sb a word of advice/advice/counsel/a wise word
it's all very well to talk, but getting things done is another matter (idiom)/to be an armchair expert/to blabber on
pinyin: zhan4 zhe5 shuo1 hua4 bu4 yao1 teng2

definition: an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved (idiom)
to talk sb round/to straighten sth out/to enlighten
words from the bottom of one's heart
senior or older female schoolmate
90s generation
older (than average in a group, at school, for marriage etc)
(fig.) history full of suffering/heart-rending story/CL:部[bu4]
unpracticed/inexperienced/naive/unsophisticated
major principle/general truth/sermon (reproof)/bombastic talk
bewildered/perplexed/confused/difficult problem/perplexity
the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within/to know best by personal experience
pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1

definition: inexperienced
to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
